Token.Abstract: Provides a custom serializer for a class. You can handle cross-platform serialization of any object or override the default serialization of an object. For example, CDTDataObjectMapper serializes NSDate objects. However, you can use this extension to override how NSDate is serialized. You might also provide serialization of CLLocation objects, which are currently ignored by the CDTDataObjectMapper.
Get the JSON representation for the property value.

Parameter.Name: propertyValue
Parameter.Abstract: The navtive property value to be serialized to a JSON dictionary.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Error that occurred during serilization or nil

ReturnValue.Abstract: The JSON representation for the property value.

Token.Abstract: Get the property value from the JSON representation

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Error that occurred during deserilization or nil
